com.sensoro.beacon.kit

Interface SensoroBeaconConnection.BeaconConnectionCallback

  • Enclosing class:
    SensoroBeaconConnection

    public static interface SensoroBeaconConnection.BeaconConnectionCallback
    The callback interface of the beacon.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAcceleratorCountUpdate(Beacon beacon, int count)
      This method is called automatically once the acceleration sensor state is changing after connecting the beacon successfully.

      This method is called automatically once the acceleration sensor state is changing after connecting the beacon successfully.

      The callback method of updating sensor data.The method will be called when calling SensoroBeaconConnection.reloadSensorData()

    • Method Detail

      • onConnectedState

        void onConnectedState(Beacon beacon,
                    int newState,
                    int status)
        The callback method when the state of the connection is changed.
        Parameters:
        beacon - The current beacon.
        newState - The new connection state of connecting the beacon. It can be one of CONNECTED or DISCONNECTED. See Beacon.CONNECTED and Beacon.DISCONNECTED
        status - The result of connecting the beacon.It can be SUCCESS or FAILURE. See SensoroBeaconConnection.SUCCESS and SensoroBeaconConnection.FAILURE

      • onSetNewPassword

        void onSetNewPassword(Beacon beacon,
                    int status)
        The callback method of setting a new password.
        Parameters:
        beacon - The current beacon.
        status - the result of setting new password.It can be SUCCESS or FAILURE. See SensoroBeaconConnection.SUCCESS and SensoroBeaconConnection.FAILURE

      • onDisabledPassword

        void onDisabledPassword(Beacon beacon,
                      int status)
        The callback method of disabling password.
        Parameters:
        beacon - The current beacon.
        status - The result of disabling the password.It can be SUCCESS or FAILURE. See SensoroBeaconConnection.SUCCESS and SensoroBeaconConnection.FAILURE

      • onCheckPassword

        void onCheckPassword(Beacon beacon,
                   int status)
        The callback method of checking password.
        Parameters:
        beacon - The current beacon.
        status - The result of checking the password.It can be SUCCESS or FAILURE. See SensoroBeaconConnection.SUCCESS and SensoroBeaconConnection.FAILURE

      • onSetBaseSetting

        void onSetBaseSetting(Beacon beacon,
                    int status)
        The callback method of modifying the base settings.
        Parameters:
        beacon - The current beacon.
        status - The result of setting base settings.It can be SUCCESS or FAILURE. See SensoroBeaconConnection.SUCCESS and SensoroBeaconConnection.FAILURE

      • onSetSensorSetting

        void onSetSensorSetting(Beacon beacon,
                      int status)
        The callback method of modifying the sensor setting.
        Parameters:
        beacon - The current beacon.
        status - The result of setting the sensor settings.It can be one of SUCCESS or FAILURE. See SensoroBeaconConnection.SUCCESS and SensoroBeaconConnection.FAILURE

      • onSetMajoMinor

        void onSetMajoMinor(Beacon beacon,
                  int status)
        The callback method of modifying the major and minor.
        Parameters:
        beacon - The current beacon.
        status - The result of setting the major and minor.It can be one of SUCCESS or FAILURE. See SensoroBeaconConnection.SUCCESS and SensoroBeaconConnection.FAILURE

      • onSetProximityUUID

        void onSetProximityUUID(Beacon beacon,
                      int status)
        The callback method of modifying the proximity UUID.
        Parameters:
        beacon - The current beacon.
        status - The result of setting the UUID.It can be one of SUCCESS or FAILURE. See SensoroBeaconConnection.SUCCESS and SensoroBeaconConnection.FAILURE

      • onResetToFactory

        void onResetToFactory(Beacon beacon,
                    int status)
        The callback method of resetting to factory.
        Parameters:
        beacon - The current beacon.
        status - Return the result of resetting to factory.It can be one of SUCCESS or FAILURE. See SensoroBeaconConnection.SUCCESS and SensoroBeaconConnection.FAILURE

      • onResetAcceleratorCount

        void onResetAcceleratorCount(Beacon beacon,
                           int status)
        The callback method of resetting acceleration sensor count.
        Parameters:
        beacon - The current beacon.
        status - The result of resetting the accelerator count.It can be one of SUCCESS or FAILURE. See SensoroBeaconConnection.SUCCESS and SensoroBeaconConnection.FAILURE

      • onUpdateSensorData

        void onUpdateSensorData(Beacon beacon,
                      int status)
        The callback method of updating sensor data.The method will be called when calling SensoroBeaconConnection.reloadSensorData()
        Parameters:
        beacon - The current beacon.
        status - The result of updating the senso data.It can be one of SUCCESS or FAILURE. See SensoroBeaconConnection.SUCCESS and SensoroBeaconConnection.FAILURE

      • onTemperatureDataUpdate

        void onTemperatureDataUpdate(Beacon beacon,
                           int temperature)
        This method is called automatically once the temperature condition is changing after connecting the beacon successfully.
        Parameters:
        beacon - The current beacon.
        temperature - temperature of environment condition

      • onBrightnessLuxDataUpdate

        void onBrightnessLuxDataUpdate(Beacon beacon,
                             double brightnessLux)
        This method is called automatically once the light condition is changing after connecting the beacon successfully.
        Parameters:
        beacon - The current beacon.
        brightnessLux - The illumination intensity.

      • onAcceleratorMovingUpdate

        void onAcceleratorMovingUpdate(Beacon beacon,
                             int movingState)
        This method is called automatically once the acceleration sensor state is changing after connecting the beacon successfully.
        Parameters:
        beacon - The current beacon.
        movingState - Current moving state of the beacon.

      • onAcceleratorCountUpdate

        void onAcceleratorCountUpdate(Beacon beacon,
                            int count)
        This method is called automatically once the acceleration sensor state is changing after connecting the beacon successfully.
        Parameters:
        beacon - The current beacon.
        count - Moving count of the beacon.
